attr.title: The Girl From Arkanya
attr.desc: The Girl from Arkanya is a top-down treasure hunting RPG, mimicking the style and feel of 2D Zelda games. Explore the jungles of Amazonia as Marisa, alongside her capybara companion!
attr.inst: This port uses the Linux game assets with Box64. Wine is not involved. Copy your game assets to the `data` folder. If you own the Steam version, you can use https://steamdb.info/depot/1447822/manifests/ to grab the latest depot download link. Copy it into the Steam console to download the Linux package.
